Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows retired public employees who participated in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations to seek certain employment without diminution of retirement benefits
Summary: Relates to allowing retired public employees who participated in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations to seek subsequent employment with the state or a municipal corporation without diminution of retirement benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to allowing retired public employees who participated in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations to seek subsequent employment with the state or a municipal corporation without diminution of retirement benefits
